languages.text:
"День 6, девятый месяц цикла...
Пора остановить это. Тронов столько, что я не успеваю тратить, но и погибших людей не счесть. Вчера я прошел мимо десятка своих людей и не узнал четверых. Покупатели спрашивают, почему на ящиках с товаром столько крови.
Будь проклят день, когда я поверил этой криволапой ксеносской крысе! Его поставки убивают моих ребят без всяких перестрелок. В следующий раз, когда Мерд'Ки войдет сюда, выйти уже не сможет. Уж я об этом позабочусь".

traits.locale_text:
"День 6, девятый месяц цикла...
Пора остановить это. Тронов столько, что я не успеваю тратить, но и погибших людей не счесть. Вчера я прошел мимо десятка своих людей и не узнал четверых. Покупатели спрашивают, почему на ящиках с товаром столько крови.

languages.text:
"Day six of the ninth month of the cycle...
It is time to end this. The thrones are coming in faster than I can spend them, but I am starting to lose count of the people who died. Yesterday, I walked past a dozen of my people and couldn't recognise four. The customers are starting to ask why there's so much blood on the delivery crates.
Damned if I believe that crooked-ass xenos rat again! His deliveries are killing my guys, and there haven't even been any shootouts. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I'll make sure of it."

It is time to end this. The thrones are coming in faster than I can spend them, but I am starting to lose count of the people who died. Yesterday I walked past a dozen of my people and couldn't recognize four. The customers are asking why there is so much blood on the crates with the goods.
Damned be the day I believed that crooked-ass xenos rat! His deliveries are killing my guys with no gunfire involved. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I will make sure of it."

Damned if I believe that crooked-ass xenos rat again! His deliveries are killing my guys, and there haven't even been any shootouts. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I'll make sure of it."

languages.text:
「サイクルの9カ月目、6日…
ここが終わりにするタイミングだ。処分しきれないほどの速さでブツがどんどん運ばれてくるが、これまで数えきれないほどの仲間が死んだ。昨日、10数人の遺体の横を通ったが、そのうちの4人は知らない奴らだった。出荷用の箱になぜ大量の血がついているのかと聞いてくる顧客も増えてきた。
あのクソ異種族め、二度と信じるもんか！あいつの商品のせいで俺の仲間がバタバタと死んでいる。ここ最近は銃撃戦も起きていないのにだ。今度マードキーが来たら生きて帰さねえ。絶対に始末してやる」
languages.original_text:
"Day six of the ninth month of the cycle...
It is time to end this. The thrones are coming in faster than I can spend them, but I am starting to lose count of the people who died. Yesterday, I walked past a dozen of my people and couldn't recognise four. The customers are starting to ask why there's so much blood on the delivery crates.
Damned if I believe that crooked-ass xenos rat again! His deliveries are killing my guys, and there haven't even been any shootouts. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I'll make sure of it."

languages.text:
«Día seis del noveno mes del ciclo...
Es hora de acabar con esto. Ganamos más tronos de los que puedo gastar, pero empiezo a perder la cuenta de la gente que ha muerto. Ayer pasé frente a una docena de mi gente y había cuatro a los que no reconocía. Los clientes empiezan a preguntar por qué hay tanta sangre en las cajas de las entregas.
Maldita sea, ¡no voy a confiar en esa maldita rata xenos nunca más! Sus entregas están matando a mi gente sin necesidad de tiroteos. La próxima vez que venga Merd'Kee, no saldrá de aquí con vida. Me encargaré de ello».
languages.original_text:
"Day six of the ninth month of the cycle...
It is time to end this. The thrones are coming in faster than I can spend them, but I am starting to lose count of the people who died. Yesterday, I walked past a dozen of my people and couldn't recognise four. The customers are starting to ask why there's so much blood on the delivery crates.
Damned if I believe that crooked-ass xenos rat again! His deliveries are killing my guys, and there haven't even been any shootouts. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I'll make sure of it."

Es hora de acabar con esto. Ganamos más tronos de los que puedo gastar, pero empiezo a perder la cuenta de la gente que ha muerto. Maldita sea, ¡no voy a confiar en esa maldita rata xenos nunca más! Sus entregas están matando a mi gente sin necesidad de tiroteos. La próxima vez que venga Merd'Kee, no saldrá de aquí con vida. Me encargaré de ello».

languages.text:
“本周期的第九个月，第六天……
差不多该收手了，花钱的速度已经赶不上赚钱的速度了，但我已经数不过来手底下到底死了多少人。昨天我从一群下人身边经过，里面有四个人我都不认识。客户也开始询问，集装箱上为什么总是血迹斑斑。
真该死，我再也不会相信那个阴险的异形臭老鼠了！每次给他送货，都要搭上我好几个兄弟，可我甚至连枪声都没听到过。等莫德吉下次再来，他就别打算活着离开了，我要亲自解决他。”
languages.original_text:
"Day six of the ninth month of the cycle...
It is time to end this. The thrones are coming in faster than I can spend them, but I am starting to lose count of the people who died. Yesterday, I walked past a dozen of my people and couldn't recognise four. The customers are starting to ask why there's so much blood on the delivery crates.
Damned if I believe that crooked-ass xenos rat again! His deliveries are killing my guys, and there haven't even been any shootouts. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I'll make sure of it."

traits.locale_text:
“本周期的第九个月，第六天……
差不多该收手了，花钱的速度已经赶不上赚钱的速度了，但我已经数不过来手底下到底死了多少人。昨天我从一群下人身边经过，里面有四个人我都不认识。客户也开始询问，集装箱上为什么总是血迹斑斑。
真该死，我再也不会相信那个阴险的异形臭老鼠了！每次给他送货，都要搭上我好几个兄弟，可我甚至连枪声都没听到过。等莫德吉下次再来，他就别打算活着离开了，我要亲自解决他。”

languages.text:
« Sixième jour, neuvième mois du cycle...
Il est temps d'en finir. Je gagne plus de trônes que je peux en dépenser, mais je commence à perdre le compte du nombre de gens qui sont morts. Hier, j'ai croisé une douzaine de mes hommes, mais y en avait quatre que j'ai pas reconnus. En plus, les clients commencent à demander pourquoi y a autant de sang sur les caisses.
Je ferai plus jamais confiance à cette enflure de xénos ! Ses livraisons tuent mes gars l'un après l'autre, alors qu'il y a pas eu la moindre fusillade. La prochaine fois que Mird'Kee se pointera, il ne repartira pas d'ici vivant. Je m'en occuperai personnellement. »
languages.original_text:
"Day six of the ninth month of the cycle...
It is time to end this. The thrones are coming in faster than I can spend them, but I am starting to lose count of the people who died. Yesterday, I walked past a dozen of my people and couldn't recognise four. The customers are starting to ask why there's so much blood on the delivery crates.
Damned if I believe that crooked-ass xenos rat again! His deliveries are killing my guys, and there haven't even been any shootouts. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I'll make sure of it."

languages.text:
"Sechster Tag des neunten Monats des Zyklus ...
Es wird Zeit, es zu beenden. Die Thronmünzen kommen schneller herein, als ich sie ausgeben kann, doch ich verliere langsam den Überblick, wie viele Leute schon gestorben sind. Gestern bin ich an einem Dutzend meiner Leute vorbeigegangen und kannte keine vier davon. Die Kunden fragen sich langsam, warum auf den Lieferkisten so viel Blut ist.
Ich will verdammt sein, wenn ich dieser verfluchten Xenos-Ratte je wieder glaube! Seine Lieferungen bringen meine Leute um, dabei gab es nicht einmal eine Schießerei. Wenn Merd'kee nächstes Mal herkommt, reist er nicht mehr lebend ab. Dafür werde ich sorgen."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
"Döngünün dokuzuncu ayının altıncı günü...
Artık bu işe bir son vermem lazım. O kadar çok gelt kazanıyoruz ki harcamaya vaktim olmuyor ama ölenlerin de haddi hesabı yok. Daha dün adamlarımın yanından geçince dördünü tanıyamadım. Müşteriler, teslim ettiğimiz kasaların neden kanla kaplı olduğunu sorup duruyor.
Bir daha o yalancı zeno itine inanırsam ne olayım! Verdiği mallar adamlarımı öldürüyor, hem de hiç silahlı çatışmada olmadan. Merd'Kee hele bir tekrar gelsin, buradan ölüsü çıkar. Orası garanti."
languages.original_text:
"Day six of the ninth month of the cycle...
It is time to end this. The thrones are coming in faster than I can spend them, but I am starting to lose count of the people who died. Yesterday, I walked past a dozen of my people and couldn't recognise four. The customers are starting to ask why there's so much blood on the delivery crates.
Damned if I believe that crooked-ass xenos rat again! His deliveries are killing my guys, and there haven't even been any shootouts. Next time Merd'Kee comes here, he won't be leaving this place alive. I'll make sure of it."
